subclass.description: Focuses on relentless rage and the ability to go into a frenzied state, gaining extra attacks.
Gains spirit animal companions and unique abilities based on chosen totems, emphasizing versatility and survival.
Masters of storytelling and knowledge, gaining abilities that enhance spellcasting and provide skills.
Inspires bravery in allies, enhancing their combat capabilities and gaining additional combat prowess.
Emphasizes healing and preservation, enhancing healing spells and granting protective abilities.
Wielders of radiant energy, focusing on illumination and damage against foes, often with spells that inflict radiant damage.
Connects deeply with nature, gaining spells and abilities to control plants and animals.
Harnesses the power of storms and thunder, focusing on damage dealing and control over weather.
Deceptive and clever, using illusions and cunning to outmaneuver opponents.
Focuses on combat prowess, granting abilities to enhance martial abilities and leadership in battle.
Draws power from the land, gaining spells based on terrain types and abilities to regain spell slots.
Masters of shapeshifting, enhancing Wild Shape abilities to transform into more powerful creatures.
Focuses on raw physical prowess, gaining critical hit enhancements and improved combat abilities.
Tactical fighters who use maneuvers to control the battlefield and enhance their attacks.
Combines martial prowess with arcane magic, gaining spellcasting abilities to complement their combat skills.
Masters of martial arts, focusing on unarmed strikes and techniques that manipulate opponents' movements.
Stealthy monks who utilize shadow magic to teleport and become unseen, emphasizing stealth and deception.
Monks who learn to harness elemental magic, allowing them to cast spells related to fire, water, earth, and air.
Holy warriors who embody the ideals of justice and righteousness, gaining abilities that enhance their combat and protective capabilities.
Champions of nature and life, gaining abilities that protect allies and manipulate the battlefield.
Seekers of retribution, focusing on punishing foes and gaining powers to pursue enemies relentlessly.
Skilled trackers and hunters who gain abilities to combat various foes and enhance their combat capabilities.
Forms a bond with an animal companion, gaining abilities to fight alongside and coordinate with their beast.
Masters of stealth and agility, gaining abilities to excel in thievery and mobility.
Experts in infiltration and silent takedowns, focusing on dealing high damage to unsuspecting targets.
Blends magic with stealth, using spells to enhance their roguish skills and create distractions.
Sorcerers with draconic heritage, gaining powers related to their dragon ancestry, including elemental spells.
Channeling chaotic magical energy, these sorcerers can unleash unpredictable effects when they cast spells.
Draws power from fey beings, gaining abilities that manipulate emotions and illusions.
Forms a pact with a fiendish entity, focusing on fire spells and abilities that enhance damage.
Gains powers from eldritch entities, emphasizing mind control and telepathy.
Masters of protective spells, gaining abilities to shield themselves and allies from harm.
Specializes in summoning creatures and creating magical effects, enhancing versatility.
Seers and fortune-tellers, gaining powers to foresee events and manipulate luck.
Focuses on charm and control spells, influencing the minds of others.
Masters of elemental spells, dealing devastating damage through powerful evocation magic.
Experts in creating illusions and manipulating perception, gaining abilities to deceive and mislead.
Focuses on death magic, gaining the ability to manipulate life and death.
Masters of changing forms and substances, gaining abilities to alter the physical properties of objects and creatures.
